ResponseText: "Denmark has taken the top spot on the United Nation's first ever World Happiness Report, followed by Finland, Norway and the Netherlands....." World Happiness Report 2012: Scandinavian Countries Are Happiest On Earth (SLIDESHOW) Could it be that high taxes and having lots of social programs such as universal health care and free university education contribute a lot to their levels of happiness? I'll bet there is a lot less inequality in those nations- no reason for the 99% to complain and organize protests.
Democratic socialists are happy people. People have jobs, little reason to commit crimes, they enjoy life instead of enduring the suffering that fascism demands.
Australians are the friendliest people in the world.
